run.script:
cd packages/myschoolapp-reporting
source .env
node ./dist/bin/msar.js snapshot --stdoutLevel all -u "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields username)" -p "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields password --reveal)" --sso $SSO --outputPath "$OUT" --pretty --no-gradebook --no-bulletinBoard --no-topics "$URL"
